categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: J'oopi Shé was a Kadas'sa'Nikto male Jedi Master from Kintan who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars, a pan-galactic conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Shé was a member of the Order's Technical division, and attended meetings at the briefing room in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, the galactic capital.

J'oopi Shé, a Kadas'sa'Nikto male, was a Jedi Master from the planet Kintan active during the Clone Wars, a pan-galactic conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the war, Shé attended meetings in the briefing room at the Jedi Temple on the galactic capital Coruscant. Shé was a member of the Technical division, which was responsible for maintaining and repairing all craft.

In 19 BBY, the final year of the war, Master Shé, alongside fellow Jedi Jedi Knights Melik Galerha and Ma'kis'shaalas, along with Master Shadday Potkin, attended a meeting in the Jedi briefing room regarding the Republic's Outer Rim Sieges campaign. The meeting was presented by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi shortly before the Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine initiated Order 66, which compelled most clone troopers to execute their Jedi Generals and any other Jedi.
